comments.body:
The html-host-manager-howto does not exist, and I have made that clear by adding
a "Coming Soon!" message to the list for 5.5.13.  If you feel like writing it,
awesome ;)

description:
The html-host-manager-howto.html and host-manager-howto.html is missing in the
host-manager webapp. An 404-error occurs.

If I am clicking on a newly created host the message "FAIL - Unknown command
/host_name" occurs.

Thorsten
summary: host-manager-howto.html is missing in Host-Manager webapp
